resources.string: Before you take it... you should know the truth.
The island is indeed a place of legend. There is power, and surely riches as well. But many have sought to claim them, and vanished without a trace.
As we drew near, I sensed an unnatural darkness. A madness overcame the crew. What I witnessed was beyond any evil the world has ever known. How I survived… I do not know.
The contents of this box are not of this world. They will guide you to that one. Wherever and whatever it is.
Go then, Captain. Chart your course and your fate. I wish you Godspeed. I will say a prayer for the souls of your crew.
The island is indeed a place of legend. There is power, and vast riches as well. But many who’ve sought to claim them have simply vanished without a trace.
I was there - I saw the horrors, the madness that overcame the crew. It was beyond any evil the world has ever known. How I survived… I do not know.
The stories you’ve heard... they don’t tell the whole truth.
The island is indeed the place of legend. There is power, and vast riches as well. But those who’ve gone before you have simply vanished, never heard from again.
I saw the horror--the madness that overcame the crew. It was beyond any evil the world has ever known. How I survived… I do not know.
The contents of this box are not of this world. They will guide you to that one. Wherever and whatever that may be…
Go then, Captain. Chart your course and your fate… I will say a prayer for the souls of your crew.
The gift I offer… do you realize its value?
The island is the source of all legends. There is power beyond your wildest dreams, and vast riches as well. One must simply sail into those pristine waters and claim them.
I saw it all first-hand… the welcoming shores, the tropical weather. The crew was awestruck—we found paradise. I only returned to carry the message.
This box contains just a fraction of the magic from that world… it will guide you there and give you the strength to ensure your success.
Go then, Captain. Chart your course and your destiny… I pray godspeed for your ship, and glory to you and your crew.
Now, I know the island's secret! Now, I know true power!
Where… is… my… box!
I feel much better now!
I will crush you beneath my heel, ant!
You would have been better off dying at sea!
You can't possibly match the strength Corruption has given me.
Give in to Corruption! It's the only way to keep your soul!
Prepare to have your soul crushed!
Ha! Pathetic!
You are the past - I am the future!
Time to taste Corrupted Steel!
I will see you destroyed!
NO! Not… again!
This will be the last time we meet.
I now serve the Tempest… most willingly.
You cannot possibly challenge us now.
She sent me… to destroy you!
Don't you see? It was her soul all along!
You should have known better than to come here.
Fortunately, I have minions to deal with whatever flotsam washes in.
You will give in to Corruption, or you will be destroyed.”
Target practice before my ships set sail to corrupt the world.
You don't deserve the honor of dying at my hand.
I keep them hungry for just such an occasion.
Behold the true face of Corruption.
Hell hath no fury like me!
But...my destiny...
No! This power is MINE!
Now that I have my soul, I have no more need for you.
The Tempest will swallow you whole.
Meet my slaves. Soon, you will be one of them.
I have great plans for you.
I will make an example of you.
Ah. One last obstacle.
Have you come to worship me? It won't save you.
Welcome to the new world order.
Hilarious. Like cockroaches storming the gates.
I am Isabella. You'll find I am nothing like that fool, Thorpe.
I take what I want, and I want everything.
You will make an excellent target.
Whoever kills them will be rewarded.
This should be amusing.
Dance for me.
You deserve a truly pathetic death.
It seems you long for death. Such a waste.
Hah. Struggle all you want.
Let's not waste my time.
Do you like my pets? Would you like to be one of them?
No...I can't die...
Worship me and despair!
I will not be denied!
I will crush you utterly.
Beg on your knees for death!
I've waited a hundred years for this.

string.comment: VO callout plays shortly after entering the dungeon
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And so shall those foolish souls enter her domain… ignorant to their true purpose.

string.comment: Isabella appears at the Gate of Madness and stands before the players.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And they shall soon witness horrors beyond their comprehension...

string.comment: Isabella appears at the Gate of Madness and stands before the players.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Beyond what mortal minds were meant to endure…

string.comment: VO callout plays as players make their descent towards the Basilica.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Deeper, they shall come… beyond evil, beyond truth…

string.comment: VO callout plays as players reach an iron gate that closes in front of them as they are ambushed from behind.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And they shall be battered by the mighty hordes, drained of their strength...

string.comment: VO callout plays as players enter the Cellar of Despair.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And they shall be lashed by tongues of darkness, purged of their resolve…

string.comment: VO callout plays as players exit the cellar and head towards the Corrupted Graveyard.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Deeper still, they shall come, beyond sadness, beyond death…

string.comment: Isabella stands waiting at entry hall of the Basilica.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And behold, they will gaze upon the face of their fear, the champion of their doom…

string.comment: Isabella is retreating from the encounter in the Basilica’s entry hall.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Through a crucible of body, mind, and spirit, the champion shall pass.

string.comment: Isabella has fled to the back of the Basilica towards the alter.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And she shall abandon the weak and unworthy...

string.comment: Isabella has fled to the back of the Basilica towards the alter.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: That they may face their torment alone.

string.comment: An alternate version of Isabella waits collapsed on the docks below the City of Darkness. Players see the relic box and she comments.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: On the shores of darkness, they shall find one sliver of light… a box, a very personal box…

string.comment: An alternate version of Isabella waits collapsed on the docks below the City of Darkness. Players bring the relic box to her. She stands up and takes the box.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Is all this a dream? If I open the box, is that the way to awaken…?

string.comment: An alternate version of Isabella waits collapsed on the docks below the City of Darkness. Players bring the relic box to her. She stands up and takes the box.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And now the dream is released… only the darkness remains…

string.comment: An alternate version of Isabella waits collapsed on the docks below the City of Darkness. Players bring the relic box to her. She stands up and takes the box.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And that shall be the final price the Champion must pay…

string.comment: Boss intro for Isabella for the basilica chandelier encounter
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And so the Champion rises above all in power, in glory…

string.comment: Isabella is retreating from the boss fight on top of the chandelier.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: There shall be no reprieve, no mercy…

string.comment: Isabella is transforming into her winged form.
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: And at long last, the fools shall know their true purpose - that SHE would feast upon their souls!

string.comment: Isabella pulls Corruption power from the Portal
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: Fools, my power is endless!

string.comment: Isabella realizes Corruption is abandoning her
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: What…? No!

string.comment: Isabella falls and disintegrates
string.speaker: The Tempest

resources.string: I am forsaken..
